job.title: senior data scientist
job.description: ltstronggtNow Brewing  Sr Data Scientist tobeapartnerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtFrom the beginning Starbucks set out to be a different kind of company One that not only celebrated coffee and the rich tradition but that also brought a feeling of connection We are known for developing extraordinary leaders who share this passion and are guided by their service to othersltbrgtltbrgtAs a Starbucks Sr Data Scientist you will build data products uncover customer insights ampamp communicate discoveries that drive towards better decisions across the Marketing ampamp Digital domains and develop a strong partnership with stakeholders to enhance understanding of our customersltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtLeveraging Your Previous Experience We Will Enable You ToltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtEvaluate ampamp translate unstructured questions from business teams to data problems and define roadmap for potential data solutionsltligtltligtWork independently as well as part of crossfunctional teams to build relevant analytics solutions using quantitative approachesltligtltligtDrive adoption of analytics data products ampamp insights across business teamsltligtltligtUtilize systems thinking approach to conceive plan ampamp build evergreen data productsltligtltligtDevelop analytic systems ampamp predictive models experiment with new data science techniques and visualize data ampamp craft effective communications to share discoveriesltligtltligtEstablish key performance indicators for the business team and promote data driven decision making that allows for effective planning in stakeholder teamsltligtltligtEstablish yourself ampamp the team as subject matter experts in advanced analytics across departmentsltligtltligtCollaborate with other data scientists ampamp business teams across the Marketing ampamp Digital spaces to drive foundational understanding of the Starbucks digital experienceltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWed Love To Hear From People WithltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtDemonstrated experience with data munging analysis machine learning techniques ampamp visualizationltligtltligtStrong problem solving skills with ability to influence business teams at different levelsltligtltligtWorking knowledge of data systems design ampamp data technologiesltligtltligtKnowledge of statistical methods ampamp scripting SQL Python or RltligtltligtRetail customer loyalty andor eCommerce experienceltbrgtltligtltulgtJoin us and be part of something bigger Apply todayltbrgtltbrgtltemgtltemgtStarbucks and its brands are an equal opportunity employer of all qualified individualsltbrgtltbrgtWe are committed to creating a diverse and welcoming workplace that includes partners with diverse backgrounds and experiences We believe that enables us to better meet our mission and values while serving customers throughout our global communities People of color women LGBTQIA veterans and persons with disabilities are encouraged to applyltbrgtltbrgtQualified applicants with criminal histories will be considered for employment in a manner consistent with all federal state and local ordinances Starbucks Corporation is committed to offering reasonable accommodations to job applicants with disabilities If you need assistance or an accommodation due to a disability please contact us at 2063180660 or via email at
